page.title: 01Hordon-on-the-Hill Info.
page.content: {Hordon-on-the Hill Information { Hordon on the hill is a semi-rural village with mixed housing and social groups. A large amount of agricultural land supports several old farms. Most people leave the village to go to work. Village is 5 miles from Basildon, 2 miles from Stamford le hope and 26 miles east of London. The nearest stations are Stamford and laindon. It has a parish church of St. Peter and Paul, a methodist chapel and R.C. Church of "Sacred Heart". Pop. 2 800, there are two very old public houses, shops in the village and a primary school. Children travel to Grays or Stamford for secondary education. The Woolmarket is a conservation area, there is a scout hut on the rec.ground and many other societies meet in the village.
